3  using System.Threading.Tasks;

8  /// <summary>
9  /// Helpers to animate pages in specific ways
10  /// </summary>
11  public static class PageAnimations
12  {
13  #region Public Methods
14 
15  /// <summary>
16  /// Slide and fade in from right.
17  /// </summary>
18  /// <param name="page">TODO The page.</param>
19  /// <param name="seconds">TODO The seconds.</param>
20  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/>.</returns>
21  public static async Task SlideAndFadeInFromLeftAsync(this Page page, float seconds)
22  {
23  var sb = new Storyboard();
24  sb.AddSlideFromLeft(seconds, page.WindowWidth);
25  sb.AddFadeIn(seconds);
26  sb.Begin(page);
27  page.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
28  await Task.Delay((int)seconds * 1000);
29  }
30
